title: Meet Rezero, the dancing ballbot
description: Engineering student Péter Fankhauser demonstrates Rezero, a robot that balances on a ball. Designed and built by students, Rezero is the first ballbot made to move quickly and gracefully -- and even dance. (Could the Star Wars sphere droid be real? Watch this and judge.)
author: Péter Fankhauser
keywords: TED, talks, creativity, design, engineering, robots, technology
